name: Tiles Of Fortune
description:
Play with thousands of players around the globe in this addictive blast adventure game. Match Color Tiles and build villages, attack your friends and collect treasure island coins!
Explore the mysterious villages, build your kingdom and become the ultimate raid master! Start the coin run, unlock new places, and discover the amazing world of Tiles of Fortune.

In this free coin game, you can easily progress and build your treasure island. Show your friends who is the real Fortune King!
Conquer ancient villages, steal gold from other players, and prove yourself as the master of coins.

Can you become the new Fortune King of Tiles of Fortune and top the leaderboard? Get ready to raid!
Play with your Facebook friends and start your next addictive adventure game NOW!
Whether you're looking for a casual, adventure, blast, or raid game, Tiles of Fortune is a game you can't miss!

Download Tiles of Fortune for FREE, play with your Facebook friends, and start your next addictive adventure game NOW! Whether you're looking for a casual, adventure, blast, or raid game, Tiles of Fortune is a game you can't miss!

● EXPLORE THE KINGDOM & BUILD UNIQUE VILLAGES
Blasting tiles, stealing treasures from other players, and collecting prize cards will allow you to progress and explore the villages and the fortunes they contain. As you progress to new villages, you'll need to build unique structures, defend your village from raids, and master your blasting skills.

● STEAL & RAID TO BECOME THE NEXT COIN MASTER
Win coins, energy, and gems by stealing and raiding other players from around the world. Join the treasure raid, attack, and ruin different villages to progress to the next worlds of fortune.

● PLAY AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS
Attack villages of other players online, steal gold coins and defend your village from ongoing attacks. Looking for revenge? You can raid players who attacked your village and steal their gold coins and treasures back!

Like to play multiplayer addictive blast games where you can attack other players online, loot your friends' villages, defend your village, and gain millions of coins by attacking your friends? You’d love to play Tiles of Fortune! PLAY NOW!


HOW TO PLAY ANIMAL KINGDOM?
* Tap and hold to build a bridge
* Release to drop the bridge onto the adjacent platform. Hold for the perfect duration to earn extra cool rewards, island coins, gems, and more! Your animal runner will show you the way with every bridge you build.
* Earn and collect coins from each successful bridge to spend on gear for your island. Build islands, progress in the game, and discover the animal world.
* Collect all animal cards, conquer the Animal Kingdom Islands, and become the Island King and the true Kingdom Ruler!


HOW TO PLAY TILES OF FORTUNE?
- Tap the play button to start a new turn
- Tap matching clusters of tiles to fill the prize bars
- Each bar filled grants a unique reward!
- Complete all villages to become the master of the Tiles of Fortune universe!
